title: Feta and slow roasted tomato salad with haricots verts
ingredients: ['12 medium cherry tomatoes', 'handful fresh basil leaves', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'olive oil', '300g haricots verts (fine green beans)', '50g pine nuts', '100g rocket', '175g feta', 'Dressing', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoon wholegrain mustard', '2 garlic cloves', '1/2 teaspoon clear honey', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
